name: Solar Plexus
awareness: emotional (wave awareness) — awareness in time, not in the now
biological_themes: Digestive tract around the solar plexus (gut–emotion linkage)
Pancreas / liver involvement in sugar–mood regulation
Vagal pathways mediating social/emotional bonding signals

fears.label: Fear of confrontation / truth
fears.description: Anxiety about emotional honesty, conflict, or intimacy that could change the relationship.

fears.label: Fear of rejection / exclusion
fears.description: Worry that emotional needs or principles will get you cast out.

fears.label: Fear of emotional turbulence
fears.description: Stress about emotional crises, mood swings, and ‘too much’ feeling.

fears.label: Fear of spiritual emptiness
fears.description: A wave-based anxiety that the spirit will not be met or recognized.

fears.label: Fear of losing grace / charm
fears.description: Concern that mood won’t support openness or social ease.

gates.name: 6 — Friction (Conflict / Intimacy)
quotes: The gate of intimacy and conflict.
gates.notes: 6 is the door for emotional/sexual contact. It says yes/no based on the wave. Distortion → premature contact → drama. Correct → wait for clarity.
sources: Jovian Archive – Solar Plexus as motor/awareness

gates.name: 22 — Openness (Grace)
gates.emotional_theme: Mood-based openness to social interaction and artistry.
gates.notes: 22 must honor its mood. With 12 at the Throat, it speaks beautifully when the wave is right. Not-self tries to be charming all the time.

gates.name: 37 — Friendship / The Family
gates.emotional_theme: Emotional warmth, touch, and belonging in the tribe.
gates.notes: 37 wants a fair, human deal. It meets Gate 40’s will to work. Distortion → guilt or emotional blackmail when the bargain fails.

gates.name: 49 — Principles / Revolution
gates.emotional_theme: Emotional laws, principles, and who is ‘in’ or ‘out.’
gates.notes: 49 tests loyalty and need fulfillment. If principles are violated, it can end the bond. Distortion → rejection from mood, not from clarity.

gates.name: 55 — Abundance / Spirit
gates.emotional_theme: Emotional abundance, spirit, and mood-based freedom.
gates.wave: Individual wave (mood → spirit → melancholy → creative depth)
gates.notes: 55 is pure emotional mutative power. With 39 it gets provoked into spirit. Distortion → thinking money/people will fix mood. Correct → ride the wave.
sources: Jovian Archive – Solar Plexus mutation teachings

gates.name: 30 — Clinging Fire (Feelings / Desire)
gates.emotional_theme: Intense desire to have the experience.
quotes: The gate of feelings and desire.
gates.notes: 30 binds us to what 41 began. It amplifies feeling and can dramatize outcomes. Correct → accept the rise/fall of the wave.

gates.name: 36 — Crisis / The Darkening of the Light
gates.emotional_theme: Emotional turbulence that seeks experience and change.
gates.wave: Collective abstract wave (from rest → chaos → new normal)
gates.notes: 36 needs experience to discharge the wave. With 35, it is the whole ‘adventure and mess’ channel. Distortion → creating drama to feel alive.

notes:
The Solar Plexus is both a motor and an emerging awareness. It does not know in the now — it knows over time as the wave stabilizes. Classic instruction: if your Solar Plexus is defined, **wait for emotional clarity** before decisions.

Three main waves:
1. Tribal (needs, touch, inclusion, fair bargain)
2. Individual (mood, spirit, melancholy → creativity)
3. Collective/abstract (experience, drama, meaning)

Key lines (< 25 words):
- “The Solar Plexus is the emotional authority for humanity.”
- “Clarity never comes in the now.”
- “Ride the wave before deciding.”
- “Emotions are chemistry; let it change.”
